Upcoming Super Bowls

When an event is as popular as the Super Bowl, it makes sense to plan ahead. We’re proud to offer travel packages to football’s biggest event years in advance. The upcoming Super Bowl schedule features a great lineup of popular travel destinations that will make for some incredible Super Bowl experiences.

2024 Las Vegas – Super Bowl LVIII

Football’s biggest party is heading to the entertainment capital of the world. Las Vegas will host the Super Bowl for the first time in 2024 and you can be sure it will be one for the ages. Needing little introduction, Las Vegas boasts impressive restaurants, endless shopping, and of course, legendary entertainment. Not only is Las Vegas an incomparable travel destination, it’s also home to some of the most amazing hotels on the planet. We’ve already secured rooms at some of its best, including the luxe Wynn Las Vegas. One of many highlights of the 2024 Super Bowl event is its venue. Super Bowl LVIII will be hosted by the impressive new Allegiant Stadium, one of the best in the league. This year more than ever, the Super Bowl will make the perfect excuse for a mid-winter vacation.

 

2025 New Orleans – Super Bowl LIX

In 2025, the Super Bowl will head to New Orleans, just in time for Mardi Gras season. It’s going to be great time in the Big Easy and we can arrange a custom travel package to help you experience it all. Enjoy wonderful hotels, indulgent food, extraordinary music and entertainment, and so much more. Super Bowl LVIII will mark the 11th time that New Orleans has hosted the Super Bowl; no city has more experience than NOLA. The beloved Superdome will play host and with a planned $450 million renovation in the works, it will be better than ever. We’ve made sure our guests will have easy access to both the Superdome and the French Quarter by securing hotels within walking distance: the InterContinental New Orleans and The Old No. 77 Hotel & Chandlery. You can be sure New Orleans knows how to do things right and we can’t wait to see what’s in store for visitors in 2025.

Want to get an idea of our pricing? Check out Super Bowl travel packages rates. Have questions about the Super Bowl? Check out our Super Bowl FAQ , Super Bowl Guide, or simply get in touch.
